text: Shailene Woodley and Sam Claflin are going to make you rethink your daydream about sailing around the world when their new movie, Adrift, premieres on June 1. Based on a true story, the film focuses on two avid sailors, Tami Oldham ( Woodley ) and Richard Sharp ( Claflin ). In 1983, the couple set off across the Atlantic Ocean to deliver a yacht in a trip that was meant to take them from Tahiti to San Diego. When they set off on their journey, they never expected to run into one of the worst hurricanes in history.
